00024 /*
00025 ** letDeclNodeList.c
00026 **
00027 ** based on list_template.c
00028 **
00029 ** where T has T_equal (or change this) and T_unparse

00031 
00032 # include "lclintMacros.nf"
00033 # include "llbasic.h"
00034 
00035 /*@only@*/ letDeclNodeList
00036 letDeclNodeList_new ()
00037 {
00038   letDeclNodeList s = (letDeclNodeList) dmalloc (sizeof (*s));
00039   
00040   s->nelements = 0;
00041   s->nspace = letDeclNodeListBASESIZE;
00042   s->elements = (letDeclNode *)
00043     dmalloc (sizeof (*s->elements) * letDeclNodeListBASESIZE);
00044 
00045   return (s);
00046 }
00047 
00048 static void
00049 letDeclNodeList_grow (letDeclNodeList s)
00050 {
00051   int i;
00052   letDeclNode *newelements;
00053 
00054   s->nspace += letDeclNodeListBASESIZE;
00055 
00056   newelements = (letDeclNode *) dmalloc (sizeof (*newelements)
00057                                          * (s->nelements + s->nspace));
00058 
00059   for (i = 0; i < s->nelements; i++)
00060     {
00061       newelements[i] = s->elements[i];
00062     }
00063 
00064   sfree (s->elements); 
00065   s->elements = newelements;
00066 }
00067 
00068 letDeclNodeList
00069 letDeclNodeList_add (letDeclNodeList s, letDeclNode el)
00070 {
00071   llassert (letDeclNodeListBASESIZE > 0);
00072 
00073   if (s->nspace <= 0)
00074     letDeclNodeList_grow (s);
00075 
00076   s->nspace--;
00077   s->elements[s->nelements] = el;
00078   s->nelements++;
00079 
00080   return s;
00081 }
00082 
00083 /*@only@*/ cstring
00084 letDeclNodeList_unparse (letDeclNodeList s)
00085 {
00086   cstring st = cstring_undefined;
00087 
00088   letDeclNodeList_elements (s, current)
00089   {
00090     st = message ("%qlet %s", st, ltoken_getRawString (current->varid));
00091 
00092     if (current->sortspec != NULL)
00093       {
00094         st = message ("%q: %q", st, lclTypeSpecNode_unparse (current->sortspec));
00095       }
00096     else
00097       {
00098         st = message ("%q ", st);
00099       }
00100     st = message ("%q = %q\n", st, termNode_unparse (current->term));
00101   } end_letDeclNodeList_elements;
00102 
00103   return st;
00104 }
00105 
00106 void
00107 letDeclNodeList_free (letDeclNodeList s)
00108 {
00109   int i;
00110   for (i = 0; i < s->nelements; i++)
00111     {
00112       letDeclNode_free (s->elements[i]); 
00113     }
00114 
00115   sfree (s->elements);
00116   sfree (s);
00117 }
